column1: #Text=World leaders react to death of Osama bin Laden
#Text=Osama bin Laden suggested that he was operating in the name of Islam , but in reality he makes a mockery of the fundamental values of his own and every other religion .
#Text=Leaders and officals around the world have issued varied reactions to the announcement that Osama bin Laden has been killed during a U.S. military operation in Pakistan .

#Text=has insisted it will continue fighting against militants in Afghanistan , and the United Nations said the death of bin Laden marked a " watershed moment in our common global fight against terrorism .

#Text=Announcing that the al-Qaeda leader had been killed by U.S. special forces during a forty-minute raid on a compound in Abbottabad , near the capital Islamabad , U.S. President Barack Obama said it was  a good day for America .

#Text= As terrorism continues to pose a direct threat to our security and international stability , international cooperation remains key and NATO is at the heart of that cooperation , " he said in a statement .

column1: #Text=" NATO allies and partners will continue their mission to ensure that Afghanistan never again becomes a safe haven for extremism , but develops in peace and security .
